byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and AL BAKER

lead_paragraph: Lan Shui Yu, 35, was charged with second-degree murder and criminal possession of a weapon, a knife, in the death of a 41-year-old man in Sunset Park.

headline.main: Woman Arrested After Stabbing Death at a Brooklyn Restaurant

snippet: Lan Shui Yu, 35, was charged with second-degree murder and criminal possession of a weapon, a knife, in the death of a 41-year-old man in Sunset Park.
abstract: Lan Shui Yu is arrested and charged with second-degree murder in stabbing death of Jian-Yang Zhang in Chinese restaurant in Brooklyn.
